front.title: Remote Triggered Black Hole Filtering with Unicast Reverse Path Forwarding (uRPF)

abstract.t: Remote Triggered Black Hole (RTBH) filtering is a popular and effective technique for the mitigation of denial-of-service attacks. This document expands upon destination-based RTBH filtering by outlining a method to enable filtering by source address as well. This memo provides information for the Internet community.
